branchCategory.name: TRB
branchCategory.description: <P>Series TRB flame resistance double layer tubing is suitable for air and water piping in environments where sparks from spot welders, etc., may be a problem. The double layer design uses a flame resistant resin (equivalent to UL-94 Standard V-0) for the outer layer. The TRB series is available in a variety of colors. 100m roll is available for all color types. </P>
